item.title: ARC Raiders Update 1.7.2: Blueprint Adjustments & Hidden Bunker Returns
item.description: ARC Raiders Update 1.7.2 is here! Hidden Bunker returns, blueprint drop rates optimized, and numerous bug fixes for smoother gameplay experience.

item.title: ARC Raiders North Line Update 1.2.0: Stella Montis Map Live
item.description: ARC Raiders Update 1.2.0 is here! New Stella Montis map, new ARC types, balance adjustments, and numerous bug fixes await in this major content update.
